messages.title: Standing up for our schools
messages.content: As a teacher, I know the challenges faced by our schools... committed to protecting education

messages.title: Who are Glasgow's real champions?
messages.content: Your SNP team have been leading the way... working hard for you in these tough times.

messages.title: Independence?
messages.content: It's your choice...we believe it's better for all of us if decisions about Scotland are made by the people who care most about Scotland - that's you.

messages.title: Transport summit to get Glasgow moving
messages.content: As your MSP, I would coordinate a transport summit with SPT, Glasgow City Council, transport providers, community councils...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kaukab Stewart is committed to protecting education by addressing challenges faced by schools.
The SNP team is positioned as Glasgow's real champions, highlighting their efforts during tough times.
Kaukab Stewart proposes coordinating a transport summit to improve Glasgow's transport system.

issues.education: As a teacher, I know the challenges faced by our schools... committed to protecting education

Kaukab Stewart at an event with constituents

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also includes a survey asking residents for their views on various issues.
